synopsis.text: Treasure hunting takes a magical twist when Nobita and his friends embark on an adventure with Doraemon, the robotic cat with a knack for producing extraordinary gadgets. Inspired by the classic novel 'Treasure Island,' Nobita convinces Doraemon to embark on a journey to find a real treasure hidden on a Caribbean island. As they set sail, the crew faces unexpected challenges, including a mysterious phenomenon that warps them back to the 17th century and separates Nobita from the group. While Nobita finds himself stranded on an island with a young pirate, Doraemon and the rest of the gang become entangled in a pirate war. As they navigate the treacherous waters of the past, can they reunite, unravel the secrets of Tomas Island, and discover the legendary treasure they sought? Join Doraemon and his friends on this thrilling and unpredictable journey filled with magic, mystery, and high-seas adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
